name: 100 HeroIcon in Single Component (Tailwind) - Vector
description:
I have found a lot of icon packages that are great and helpful. Although I have noticed in my work icons that use only lines rather than vectors and include multiple components fall short.


The reasoning for the single component:


  1. Using a single vector layer controlled by an Auto Layout allows quick adjustments to the icon vector which are not dependent on the component they are within.
  2. Allows for easy reuse and adapts to need by need base without having to do any adjustment on the parent component.


Note:

  • Currently only includes outlined versions and not all icons are included.
  • The first time use within a file takes some time to load although after the initial load speed is not affected.
